analysis.description:
CryptoPainting.withdrawAll (/unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#136-141) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#137-141)

CryptoPainting.withdrawAmount (/unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#141-142) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(_amount) (/unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#142)
CryptoPainting.isContract (/unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#373-377) is declared view but contains assembly code

ERC721 (/unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#49-72) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#52-53)
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#53-54)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#54-57)

CryptoPainting (/unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#73-387) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):

	-transfer (/unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#320-324)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#324-331)

CryptoPainting.name.name (local variable @ /unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#257) shadows:
	- CryptoPainting.name (function @ /unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#254-257)

CryptoPainting.symbol.symbol (local variable @ /unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#258-260) shadows:
	- CryptoPainting.symbol (function @ /unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#257-260)

CryptoPainting.populateFromItemRegistry has external calls inside a loop:
	- priceOfItem[_itemIds[i]] > 0 || itemRegistry.priceOf(_itemIds[i]) == 0 (/unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#147-152)

Reentrancy in CryptoPainting.listItemFromRegistry (/unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#153-162):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(itemRegistry.ownerOf(_itemId) != address(0)) (/unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#156-157)
	- require(bool)(itemRegistry.priceOf(_itemId) > 0) (/unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#158-159)
	- price = itemRegistry.priceOf(_itemId) (/unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#161)
	- itemOwner = itemRegistry.ownerOf(_itemId) (/unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#161-162)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- listedItems (/unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#162)
	- ownerOfItem (/unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#162)
	- priceOfItem (/unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#162)

CryptoPainting.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#373-377)
	- /unique_chucks/45/0x58d9b4936eb67d0b07e610d6d1a6d4c79edfbe11.sol#375-377
